resources.string: The access-option is the tool to choose, whether your location data is passed to the app or not. With this option you can allow or disallow an app to use your location information altogether.
How accurate is your shared location?

With accuracy, you are able to determine the precision of your device location. The value for accuracy defines a radius, in which the retrieved location usually lays in. Therefore a higher value is more imprecise and potentially has the effect of degrading service quality, while improving your privacy.
How current is your shared location?

Using the delay you can determine, how current the location is, that this app is able to retrieve from your device. A higher value therefore leads to more delayed retrieval of your devices location. Example: If you\'ve set to 10 Minutes, this your current location is retrieved 10 Minutes later. In the meantime the previously retrieved and already 10 minutes old location is used, if available. This could potentially degrade the service quality.
Where not to share your location?

By defining exclusion zones, you can exclude chosen areas to be ignored for location tracking. This could for example be your home, of which you don\'t want to share the location to a location based service.
How often is your location accessed?

Using the interval you can determine, how often this app is able to retrieve a new location from your device. A higher value therefore leads to a less frequent retrieval of your devices location. Example: If you\'ve set to 10 Minutes, this means a new location is at maximum retrieved every 10 Minutes. In the meantime the previously retrieved location is used, which of course it might up to 10 Minutes old, which could potentially degrade the service quality.
Who is your location shared with?
How long is your location info usable?
Using the auto-deletion-option, you can select whether and after what time your location data is deleted. This way your location-data will be invalidated automatically.
Using the location history option, you can view and manage all of your previously obtained location data.
